channel.title: OBS on Jim Shingler Blog
channel.description: Recent content in OBS on Jim Shingler Blog

item.title: Obs Virtual Cables
item.description: During covid, we all find ourselves on Zoom and Teams meetings doing presentations. Using standard Zoom and Teams, you share your slide deck and narrate it as Chris Judd says, "as a disemboded voice." It isn’t very engaging. Chris Judd introduce me to OBS - Open Broadcaster Software. OBS really is an amazing piece of softare. If you watch youtube or twitch, they are probably using OBS to make their streams.
